price: 18਼ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਆਖੋ, ਕੀ ਤੂੰ ਪਵਿਨੂੰਤਰ ਹੋਣਾ ਚਾਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ ?
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
